DocAttribute.Name: PrimeMeridian
DocAttribute.Documentation: The identification of the meridian defining zero longitude in the used geographic CRS.

DocAttribute.Name: AngleUnit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit of latitude and longitude coordinate axes composing the geographic coordinate system. > NOTE 1  Only plane angle measures are in scope and both longitude and latitude coordinate axes of the geographic coordinate system shall have the same plane angle unit. > NOTE 2  If AngleUnit is omitted, the unit for latitude and longitude coordinate axes is taken from the default project angle units, as stated in IfcProject.UnitInContext.

DocAttribute.Name: HeightUnit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit of the height coordinate axis of the geographic coordinate system. > NOTE 1  Only length measures are in scope. > NOTE 2  If HeightUnit is omitted, the unit for the height coordinate axis is taken from the default project length units, as stated in IfcProject.UnitInContext.

DocWhereRule.Name: AngleUnitIsPlaneAngle
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The type of AngleUnit in the operation shall be _IfcUnitEnum_.PLANEANGLEUNIT.

DocWhereRule.Name: HeightUnitIsLength
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The type of HeightUnit in the operation shall be _IfcUnitEnum_.LENGTHUNIT.
